channel.title: Client Help : Items
channel.description:
I am making items on my client and i want to know how to get the 'Original Color' I know its println but i need help, like whats all the code, and where do i put it..
<Edit> Like if i want to say it what code would i put in here..
[code] if(s.startsWith("original color")) { <<HERE>> } [/code]
